container.literal_block:
# Prepare to write output to a file during the solution process. row = 'iteration\t{}({})'.format( model.VOI_INFO['name'], model.VOI_INFO['units']) for s in range(0, model.STATE_COUNT): row += '\t{}({})'.format(model.STATE_INFO[s] ['name'], model.STATE_INFO[s]['units']) for s in range(0, model.VARIABLE_COUNT): row += '\t{}({})'.format(model.VARIABLE_INFO[s] ['name'], model.VARIABLE_INFO[s]['units']) row += '\n'
write_file_name = '{}_solution.txt'.format(args['m']) write_file = open(write_file_name, 'w') write_file.write(row)
